channel.title: Comments on: Utah WordPress Meetup with Matt Mullenweg

item.description: [...] sure that’s not the only reason Matt Mullenweg will be in Utah, but he was kind enough to extend his stay to meet with the locals, at a great Indian food place [...]

item.title: By: Jeff Norris
item.dc:creator: Jeff Norris
item.description: Real cool meet-up with Matt and Joseph and 33 geek/bloogers from around Utah. Spicy food, Wordpress talk . Photo's and more. We talked in a open forum about everything Wordpress, the cold weather and the wrong address (ha ha @ joe).
item.content:encoded: Real cool meet-up with Matt and Joseph and 33 geek/bloogers from around Utah. Spicy food, WordPress talk . Photo’s and more. We talked in a open forum about everything WordPress, the cold weather and the wrong address (ha ha @ joe).

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Jeff -
With having Matt there WordPress will definitely be a big topic, but also general tech topics or anything else that people want to talk about.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Jennifer -
Don't really have a planned end time. I'd go ahead and come by at 2pm, we won't be in a rush to leave.
item.content:encoded:
@Jennifer –

Don’t really have a planned end time. I’d go ahead and come by at 2pm, we won’t be in a rush to leave.
